wikibase-export-description: Adds a user-friendly Wikibase export page
wikibase-export-intro: First, choose the items for which you need data. Second, choose the time range for which you need the data. Third, choose the variables you need in the CSV file. Finally, click "$1" to retrieve the CSV file.
wikibase-export-config-invalid: Your changes were not saved. It contains the following {{PLURAL:$1|error|errors}}:
wikibase-export-config-help-messages: The following export page labels can be changed:
wikibase-export-config-help-message-intr: Introductory text shown before the form
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-def: A list of item IDs to be selected by default on the form.
The default start year on the form.
The default end year on the form.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-sta: Property ID of the qualifier used for the start of a time range.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-end: Property ID of the qualifier used for the end of a time range.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-poi: Property ID of the qualifier used for a specific point in time.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-pro: A list of property IDs for statements that may be included in the export.
